snippet: The company earned $3.8 million, or 3 cents a share, down 67 percent from $11.5 million, or 10 cents a share, a year earlier.
abstract: LinkedIn reports fourth-quarter earnings of $3.8 million, or 3 cents a share, down 67 percent from $11.5 million, or 10 cents a share, in year-earlier period; revenue climbed 47 percent, to $447 million, below expectations.
lead_paragraph: The company earned $3.8 million, or 3 cents a share, down 67 percent from $11.5 million, or 10 cents a share, a year earlier.

headline.main: Shares of Linkedin Fall on Weak Outlook for 2014
headline.print_headline: Shares of LinkedIn Fall on Weak Outlook for 2014
